basic_info.name: SITAM, Viziangaram Faculty
description: SITAM, Vizianagaram has a group of highly qualified and experienced faculty, that is committed towards the upliftment of the young students. The total number of faculty members is 97 and the institution has a good teacher-student ratio. Every faculty member has a significant years teaching experience, and are alumnis of prestigious universities. Many of them are UGC/CSIR-NET qualified and M.Phil. & Ph.D. awardees. Moreovers they have also participated in International, National Conferences, Seminars, Workshops and Training Programs.

faqs.question: Ques.Does Satya Institute of Technology and Management, Vizianagaram provide reservation in admissions?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, SITAM provides reservation criteria for students. The reservation criteria is as per the rules of Government of India and AICTE.Check:SITAM, Vizianagaram News

faqs.question: How is the faculty at Satya Institute of Technology and Management, Vizianagaram?
faqs.answer: Ans.SITAM, Vizianagaram has dedicated faculty members who aim to impart quality education to students. It has a total faculty of 97 members and all of them are highly qualified.

faqs.question: What will be the fee to pursue BTech at Satya Institute of Technology and Management, Vizianagaram?
faqs.answer: Ans.Students have to pay an average fee of INR 50,200 per annum to pursue BTech at SITAM, Vizianagaram.

faqs.question: Does Satya Institute of Technology and Management, Vizianagaram provide hostel facilities?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, SITAM, Vizianagaram provides separate hostel facilities for both boys and girls. The hostels are located in the college campus and are well equipped with all basic amenities.

Section.name: About SITAM
Section.description:
Satya Institute of Technology and Management, Vizianagaram is a private Engineering College established in 2008. The institute is affiliated to JNTU, Kakinada and offers various courses in the field of Engineering & Technology and Management at the UG and PG level.
Admission to the courses offered by SITAM are based on the candidate’s performance in various national and state level entrance exams such as AP EAMCET and AP PGECET. Additionally, SITAM, Vizianagaram has a group of 97 faculty members, who are highly qualified and experienced. SITAM also has a dedicated Training and Placement cell that provides placement assistance to the students. Some of the top recruiters are Symphony, TATA Steel and Quess Corp.
Check: SITAM, Vizianagaram Admission

Ans. Yes, SITAM provides reservation criteria for students. The reservation criteria is as per the rules of Government of India and AICTE.

Ques. Does Satya Institute of Technology and Management, Vizianagaram provide hostel facilities?
Ans. Yes, SITAM, Vizianagaram provides separate hostel facilities for both boys and girls. The hostels are located in the college campus and are well equipped with all basic amenities.
